verses.verse: I wish that<WG3785> you would bear<WG430> with me<WG3450> in<WG877> a little<WG3397> foolishness,<WG877> but<WG235> indeed<WG2532> you do bear<WG430> with me.<WG3450>

For<WG1063> I am jealous<WG2206> over you<WG5209> with a godly<WG2316> jealousy.<WG2205> For<WG1063> I married<WG718> you<WG5209> to one<WG1520> husband,<WG435> that I might present<WG3936> you as a pure<WG53> virgin<WG3933> to Christ.<WG5547>

But<WG1161> I am afraid<WG5399> that somehow,<WG3381> as<WG5613> the serpent<WG3789> deceived<WG1818> Eve<WG2096> in<WG1722> his<WG846> craftiness,<WG3834> so<WG3779> your<WG5216> minds<WG3540> might be corrupted<WG5351> from<WG575> the simplicity<WG572> that is<WG3588> in<WG1519> Christ.<WG5547>

For<WG1063> if<WG1487><WG99999> he<WG3588> who comes<WG2064> preaches<WG2784> another<WG243> Jesus,<WG2424> whom<WG3739> we did<WG2784> not<WG3756> preach,<WG2784> or<WG2228> if you receive<WG2983> a different<WG2087> spirit,<WG4151> which<WG3739> you did not<WG3756> receive,<WG2983> or<WG2228> a different<WG2087> "good news<WG2098>", which<WG3739> you did<WG1209> not<WG3756> accept,<WG1209> you put<WG430> up with<WG430> that well enough.<WG2573>
For<WG1063> I reckon<WG3049> that I am<WG5302> not<WG3367> at all behind<WG5302> the very<WG5228> best<WG3029> apostles.<WG652>

But<WG1161> though<WG1499> I am unskilled<WG2399> in speech,<WG3056> yet<WG235> I am not<WG3756> unskilled in knowledge.<WG1108> No,<WG235> in<WG1722> every way<WG3956> we have been revealed<WG5319> to<WG1519> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> all things.<WG3956>

Or did<WG2228> I commit<WG4160> a sin<WG266> in humbling<WG5013> myself<WG1683> that<WG2443> you<WG5210> might be exalted,<WG5312> because<WG3754> I preached<WG2097> to you<WG5213> God<WG2316>'s Good News<WG2098> free of charge?<WG1432>
I robbed<WG4813> other<WG243> assemblies,<WG1577> taking<WG2983> wages<WG3800> from them that I might<WG4314> serve<WG1248> you.<WG5216>

<WG2532> When I was present<WG3918> with<WG4314> you<WG5209> and<WG2532> was in need,<WG5302> I wasn't<WG3756> a burden on<WG2655> anyone,<WG3762> for<WG1063> the brothers,<WG80> when they came<WG2064> from<WG575> Macedonia,<WG3109> supplied<WG4322> the measure of my<WG3450> need.<WG5303> <WG2532> In<WG1722> everything<WG3956> I kept<WG5083> myself<WG1683> from being burdensome<WG4> to you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> I will continue to do so.<WG5083>

As<WG3754> the truth<WG225> of Christ<WG5547> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> me,<WG1698> no one<WG3756> will stop<WG4972> me<WG1691> from this<WG3778> boasting<WG2746> in<WG1722> the regions<WG2824> of Achaia.<WG1519>
Why?<WG5101> Because<WG3754> I don't<WG3756> love<WG25> you?<WG5209> God<WG2316> knows.<WG1492>

But<WG1161> what<WG3739> I do,<WG2532> that I will do,<WG4160> that<WG2443> I may cut off<WG1581> occasion<WG874> from them<WG3588> that desire<WG2309> an occasion,<WG874> that<WG2443> in<WG1722> which<WG3739> they boast,<WG2744> they may be found<WG2147> even<WG2532> as<WG2531> we.<WG2249>
For<WG1063> such<WG5108> men are false apostles,<WG5570> deceitful<WG1386> workers,<WG2040> masquerading<WG3345> as<WG1519> Christ<WG5547>'s apostles.<WG652>
And<WG2532> no<WG3756> wonder,<WG2298> for<WG1063> even Satan<WG4567> <WG846> masquerades<WG3345> as<WG1519> an angel<WG32> of light.<WG5457>

It is no<WG3756> great thing<WG3173> therefore<WG3767> if<WG1487> his<WG846> servants<WG1249> also<WG2532> masquerade<WG3345> as<WG5613> servants<WG1249> of righteousness,<WG1343> whose<WG3739> end<WG5056> will be<WG2071> according to<WG2596> their<WG846> works.<WG2041>

I say<WG3004> again,<WG3825> let<WG1380> no<WG3361> one<WG5100> think<WG1380> me<WG3165> <WG1511> foolish.<WG878> But if<WG1487> so,<WG3361> yet<WG2579> receive<WG1209> me<WG3165> as<WG5613> foolish,<WG878> that<WG2443><WG99999> I also may boast<WG2744> a little.<WG5100>

That which<WG3739> I speak,<WG2980> I don't<WG3756> speak<WG2980> according<WG2596> to the Lord,<WG2962> but<WG235> as<WG5613> in<WG1722> foolishness,<WG877> in<WG1722> this<WG3778> confidence<WG5287> of boasting.<WG2746>
Seeing that<WG1893> many<WG4183> boast<WG2744> after<WG2596> the flesh,<WG4561> I<WG2504> will also<WG2504> boast.<WG2744>
For<WG1063> you bear<WG430> with the foolish<WG878> gladly,<WG2234> being<WG5607> wise.<WG5429>

For<WG1063> you bear<WG430> with a man,<WG1487> if he<WG5100> brings<WG2615> you<WG5209> into bondage,<WG2615> if<WG1487> he<WG5100> devours<WG2719> you,<WG1487> if he<WG5100> takes<WG2983> you captive,<WG1487> if he<WG5100> exalts himself,<WG1869> if<WG1487> he<WG5100> strikes<WG1194> you<WG5209> on<WG1519> the face.<WG4383>

I speak<WG3004> by way<WG2596> of disparagement,<WG819> as<WG5613> though<WG3754> we<WG2249> had been weak.<WG770> Yet<WG1161> <WG1722> however<WG3739><WG99999> any<WG5100> is bold<WG5111> (I speak<WG3004> in<WG1722> foolishness<WG877>), I<WG2504> am bold<WG5111> also.<WG2504>
Are they<WG1526> Hebrews?<WG1445> So<WG2504> am I.<WG2504> Are they<WG1526> Israelites?<WG2475> So<WG2504> am I.<WG2504> Are they<WG1526> the seed<WG4690> of Abraham?<WG11> So<WG2504> am I.<WG2504>

Are they<WG1526> servants<WG1249> of Christ?<WG5547> (I speak<WG2980> as one beside<WG3912> himself<WG1473>) I am more<WG5228> so;<WG1722> in labors<WG2873> more abundantly,<WG5234> in<WG1722> prisons<WG5438> more abundantly,<WG4056> in<WG1722> stripes<WG4127> above measure,<WG4056> in<WG1722> deaths<WG2288> often.<WG4178>
Five times<WG3999> from<WG5259> the Jews<WG2453> I<WG2983> received forty<WG5062> stripes minus<WG3844> one.<WG1520>

Three<WG5151> times I was beaten with rods.<WG4463> Once<WG530> I was stoned.<WG3034> Three<WG5151> times I suffered shipwreck.<WG3489> I have been<WG4160> a night and a day<WG3574> in<WG1722> the deep.<WG1037>

I have been in travels<WG3597> often,<WG4178> perils<WG2794> of rivers,<WG4215> perils<WG2794> of robbers,<WG3027> perils<WG2794> from<WG1537> my countrymen,<WG1085> perils<WG2794> from<WG1537> the Gentiles,<WG1484> perils<WG2794> in<WG1722> the city,<WG4172> perils<WG2794> in<WG1722> the wilderness,<WG2047> perils<WG2794> in<WG1722> the sea,<WG2281> perils<WG2794> among<WG1722> false brothers;<WG5569>

in<WG1722> labor and<WG2532> travail,<WG1722> in watchings<WG70> often,<WG4178> in<WG1722> hunger<WG3042> and<WG2532> thirst,<WG1373> in<WG1722> fastings<WG3521> often,<WG4178> and in<WG1722> cold<WG5592> and<WG2532> nakedness.<WG1132>
Besides<WG5565> those things that are outside,<WG3924> there is that which presses<WG1999> on me<WG3450> <WG2596> daily,<WG2250> anxiety<WG3308> for all<WG3956> the assemblies.<WG1577>
Who<WG5101> is weak,<WG770> and<WG2532> I am<WG770> not<WG3756> weak?<WG770> Who<WG5101> is caused to stumble,<WG4624> and<WG2532> I<WG1473> don't<WG3756> burn with indignation?<WG4448>
If<WG1487> I must<WG1163> boast,<WG2744> I will boast<WG2744> of the things<WG3588> that concern my<WG3450> weakness.<WG769>

The God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962> of the<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> he who is<WG5607> blessed<WG2128> <WG1519> forevermore,<WG165> knows<WG1492> that<WG3754> I don't<WG3756> lie.<WG5574>
In<WG1722> Damascus<WG1154> the governor<WG1481> under King<WG935> Aretas<WG702> guarded<WG5432> the city<WG4172> of the Damascenes<WG1153> <WG5432> desiring<WG2309> to arrest<WG4084> me.<WG3165>
<WG2532> Through<WG1223> a window<WG2376> I was let down<WG5465> in<WG1722> a basket<WG4553> by<WG1223> the wall,<WG5038> and<WG2532> escaped<WG1628> his<WG846> hands.<WG5495>
